content: Well like all good things it started with beer. He comes over beer in hand and tells me that he can't find work because of his back. I know that this is true (another story). We hang out for awhile and he tells me the bank is going to take his house. His retirement is not covering the bills and the guy lives a small life. I explaine to him about this web site and what I have read. (Long story short) I don't want too look like a real jack$$$$. I tell him to apply for ssd im sure he will qualify. He asked will it effect his mil retirement/VA bennies. This is where I may have misdirected him, "No man its all good you have payed into it, just apply whats the worst that could happen" (I got to stop drinking and giving advise) "wow" I think when I am done I will kick my own a$$. I think I may have just ffff this guy he is a good guy too.

content: Don't temporarily jump to a premature conclusion. Allcohol overindulgence is good. My dad over-consumed one night in a bar and then stole their cigarette machine. Some kids grow up respecting world leaders, sports figures, or educators. I admired the drunk who dragged a cigarette machine up a flight of stairs. It made me who I am. My ultimate goal is to become a bartender in a topless joint.
reply: Don't temporarily jump to a premature conclusion. Allcohol overindulgence is good. My dad over-consumed one night in a bar and then stole their cigarette machine.
